name: Heavenly Peaks Cultivation
description: Immortal Cultivation was never so fun! Enter the Heavenly Peaks. An eastern fantasy adventure - for adults only.

name: Time Thief
description: This is a funny action game without language barriers. Operate the phantom thief Bunny Moon to steal the treasures of each stage, and watch Bunny Moon's fantasy adventure!

name: A Test Before Jianghu
description: It's a story about the mountains before we came to Jianghu You can play a boy or a girl, figure out your identity, collect G's, and win the test

name: Fap & Cum
description: Fap & Cum is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media. You should help main character to earn enough money to start making streams.

name: Baseballoons
description:
Swing for colorful balloons and avoid the bombs in this home run contest!
Earn coins to unlock the full cast of wacky characters!
Score as high as you can to rank up on the leaderboard!

name: Just a Regular Arcade
description: Mordecai and Rigby love all kinds of video games, and now you can have an arcade just like them! Choose your favorite game, and go for the high score.

name: Mahjong Bengal Tiger Adventure: Summer Majong Quest Deluxe
description: Unbelievably cool Mahjong, in which you have to play with more than 100 levels of varying difficulty. Every week updated levels. Unique and various chips on Chinese themes will not leave you indifferent. The game has a lot of chips with animals, especially the original and beautiful pieces from the Tigers. This is a real mahjong solitaire style tiger.

name: Fur and Feathers
description:
You are now looking at a new funny and cute matching game for kids and parents.
Note: this is an iPhone-only version of the game. If you like to play it on your iPad, please download "Fur and Feathers HD" instead.

name: Fairy Kingdom: Castle of Magic
description: Fairy Kingdom is a fairytale about a young Fairy and an evil Witch, of the triumph of love over spite and greed. It’s a story of heroes and their adventures, royal castles and exploration of new lands. This is a story of mysteries, treasures and magic, but first of all, this is your story, Your Majesty.

name: Z.O.N.A
description:
Game actions start in a short time after the first part Z.O.N.A. Where our protagonist reaching the post of DPS expected to leave the Chernobyl zone.
Suddenly he found himself in an abandoned bar.
Starting from this place you have to find your way across the abandoned exclusion zone. Lots of tracks, challenging puzzles and tasks are waiting for you in the game.
As well as a huge number of Soviet machinery that will help you to overcome a long way from the area or even discover the secret of what is happening here.

name: Bounty Bots
description:
Take part in the classic tale of greedy robotic desperados hurling explosive cacti and toxic goo at each other in the historic frontier town of Deadbolt.
Okay, so maybe it's not so classic, but Bounty Bots is a frantic multiplayer action game with outrageous weapons and zany powers in a West that never was.

name: RoverCraft Space Racing
description:
RoverCraft is an exciting arcade journey, played on the hills of distant planets on a rover constructed by you. Since you design your vehicle, its success depends on YOU!!
Equip your vehicle with jet engines, reactors, super-wheels and plenty of other upgrades and take the challenge of climbing the steep mountains of exotic planets. Drive your monster rover carefully – there are many dangers ahead. You might run out of fuel, meet a steep and rugged slope, your vehicle may lose its wheels, or your pilot may get a tear in his space suit.

name: Blast Beats
description: Blast Beats is an Insane 1-Tap Rhythm Game with a Power Packed Soundtrack & Retro Pixel Art Aesthetic.

name: 100 Floors Ninja
description:
Exciting experience!
This game you need to have a good heart qualities, keen observation and flexible finger manipulation, with the changes of the difficulty of the game and experience the heartbeat moment!

name: The Cursed Castle
description: Sin descripción

name: Purgatory: Mark's Creepy Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Mage Saga
description: Sin descripción

name: Landlord Go!
description:
Landlord Go is the first tycoon game based on a real map of the United States and the world. It allows you to literally bring the gameplay into the real world. Buy, sell, and upgrade real buildings that you encounter every day on your way to work or school. From grand and famous landmarks to local shops and businesses.
Collect the best properties, combine them into collections, and invest wisely in their development.

name: Hunting Clash: Hunter Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Farm Shop: Time Management Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Ships of Battle Age of Pirates
description: Ahoy, captain! Are you ready to become one of the most feared pirates in the world of the Caribbean Sea? Set sail with your pirate ship to an unexplored island near Cuba or Nassau to conquer and take over the settlement. Ships of Battle: Age of Pirates is a strategy game to explore the world while fighting epic blaze of battles.

name: Knife Aim Hit: Throwing Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Blast Motors
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Pizza Empire
description: Sin descripción

name: CyberHeroes Arena DX
description: Customize your robot for unique combat and fun!

name: Foxy's Coin Hunt
description: Foxy's Coin Hunt is an exciting platformer game where players take on the role of Foxy, a cute fox who travels through different worlds to collect as many coins as possible. Along the way, Foxy must face a variety of enemies.

name: Google Doodle: Doctor Who 50th Anniversary
description:
An interactive Google Doodle made for the Doctor Who 50th Anniversary.

Those dastardly Daleks have stolen the Google letters and we need Doctor Who to retrieve them!

name: Castle Crumble
description: Where physics allows you to have fun with a blast! Your goal is clear - castles must fall. Become a hero in far fantasylands. With powerful explosives and mystical spells, crash forts from Ancient, Medieval, Aztec and other times. Aim to win!

name: CropBytes
description:
CropBytes is a farming simulation game with a virtual economy. Players use real cryptocurrencies for money in the CropBytes economy.

Economic activities like producing, buying & selling help the economy grow. Every asset in the game is essential to the economy, they have real value and are tangled with economic activities.

The game replicates the real world by being volatile & transitional. Players create economic trends & by playing out their strategies in the game.

name: Food For Pigs
description:
It tells you, "A good farmer always feeds his pigs."
Feed the pigs.
Entry 1 in the Food For Pigs Cinematic Universe.

name: Fighter's Rampage
description: The ultimate Stickpage Fighter's Rampage; Featuring all of your favorite Stickpage characters!

name: NightFall Hollow
description:
Nightfall Hollow is a rich story driven game with a paranormal edge. Your choices matter in this game, Residents will remember your dialogue choices and they 'MAY' help you with your investigation or ignore you - depending on what you do! and what you find along the way!

A lot of love has gone in to the lore of Nightfall Hollow, and we hope you enjoy discovering it

name: Vigor Chronicles: Reckoning
description: Unfold the Chronicles and unleash reckoning to your foes! In this update you can explore our new border map Myren in Shootout and use the new Bear Trap consumable. Progress through a post-apocalyptic Battle Pass with lots of "Dieselpunk" references. Equip yourself with the new M4A1 Assault Rifle and use it as the tool of your reckoning. You'll be able to try out specific loadouts for different maps in Shootout and enjoy Vigor in Performance Mode on Xbox Series X.

name: Tetra Offline
description:
Tetra Offline is an open-source version of the game Tetra Online. Tetra Offline is a singleplayer block-stacker game made in Unity. Tetra Offline was made available as Tetra Online, which originally released on Steam as closed-source software, was taken down due to a DMCA notice on December 9, 2020.

Steam's connectivity and APIs were integral to Tetra Online's multiplayer systems. As the code itself was deemed too difficult to modify for independent hosting, the decision was made to preserve Tetra Online's singleplayer component exclusively. This release also featured many aspects of Tetra Online that were yet to be implemented into the game, or were scrapped earlier in development.

name: Phoenix Nightmare
description: Step into inmersive horror experience in the desert of Arizona. Your car broke down after traveling miles. A few meters away is a suspicious abandoned gas station. Crazy kidnapper is on the loose! Search and find ways to escape and survive collecting stuff, shooting guns and solving puzzles

name: Spongebob Boat-O-Cross
description: In this game, the player controls SpongeBob's boat and has to finish the course without crashing or hitting any obstacles. The player presses the arrow key to drive forward, presses the down arrow key to reverse, presses the right arrow key to lean forward, and presses the left arrow key to lean back. In total, there are five levels

name: Doctor Who: Into the Vortex
description:
Fly the TARDIS. How far can you travel in time?

Control the TARDIS as you travel through the time vortex. Collect blue energy particles to temporarily fuel the TARDIS and avoid red particles that will disrupt the fuel cells. If you lose all your energy, the TARDIS will fall out of the vortex and rematerialise at a location in space and time.

name: Minecraft: Vault-Tec Mash-up
description: Welcome to the wasteland! Crack open the Vault containing 44 unique skins, custom textures, re-skinned mobs, a special post-apocalyptic map, an original soundtrack compilation, and a Pip-Boy-inspired UI.

name: Tardis Tennis
description: Sick of the lack of British success at Wimbledon? Well a solution is at hand, thanks to our time-travelling Great Britons who use Dr Who's Tardis to guarantee success at SW19.

name: Minecraft: Adventure Time Mash-up
description: Adventure Time, c'mon grab your tools, we're going to a very blocky world. With Jake the Dog and Finn the Human, and a bundle of their friends, it's Adventure Time... Mash-up! Featured in this pack: your favorite Adventure Time characters, the Land of Ooo, a bespoke texture set, BMO-themed UI, and an original soundtrack.

name: Zero to Hero
description: Zero to Hero is a roguelike tactics game where you play a contestant on a 1960s game show. You get super powers, and have to overcome a gauntlet of challenges. If you get to the end, you get to keep your powers. Choose amazing upgrades and incredible transformations to go from Zero to Hero!

name: Minecraft: Norse Mythology Mash-up
description: Are you heroic enough to enter the Great Hall, Valhalla? Find out in the Norse Mythology Mash-up! Compose your own grand saga as you voyage through the 9 realms, from the treetops of Yggdrasil, down into the mines of Svartalfheim and the depths of Hel!

name: Minecraft: Pirates of the Caribbean Mash-up
description: Take what you can. Give nothing back! Join Jack and his crew in the Pirates of the Caribbean Mash-up, featuring many of your favorite rogues and rascals. Plot a course from Tortuga to Shipwreck Cove and all the way down to Davy Jones’ Locker. This is the day you will always remember as the day you sailed with Captain Jack Sparrow.

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. /v/
description: Friday Night Funkin' VS. /v/, also known as just VS. /v/ or Friday Night Fankan, is a Friday Night Funkin' mod that adds in one week with 6 songs in total (3 being bonus songs), animated and non-animated cutscenes. The mod itself is based on the site 4chan and its culture. There are also bonus materials, such as the original "Epic Frustration" comic series by 3 Angled Blue, which can be read by going to the "3AB Comics" section in the mod's main menu. In this mod, Boyfriend and Girlfriend insert a rhythm game disk into a PC, which transports them to the website known as 4chan, unaware that they have been caught in a scheme by Daddy Dearest.

name: Cadence of Hyrule: Crypt of the NecroDancer Featuring the Legend of Zelda - Octavo's Ode
description: Octavo's Ode is a free update for Cadence of Hyrule that introduces a new mode, also called Octavo's Ode, wherein Octavo is added as a playable character. Additionally, Dungeon Mode allows players to play through single dungeons without an overworld in a similar fashion to the classic Crypt of the NecroDancer.

name: Cadence of Hyrule: Crypt of the NecroDancer Featuring the Legend of Zelda - Melody Pack
description:
Listen to even more remixed versions of classic Legend of Zelda series tunes as you move to the beat with the Melody Pack DLC. A total of 39 additional tunes from 3 different artists are included!

With the Melody Pack you can designate which character and area will feature certain songs from both the original soundtrack and new remixes. Play through this rhythmic adventure to the beat of your own drum!

name: Minecraft: The Nightmare Before Christmas Mash-up
description:
A nightmare? Before Christmas?
With thousands of blocks over there
And more redstone than I can bear?
Looks scary, but also fun!
Could it be I got my wish?
Should I play, or should I run?
A Christmas pack so nightmarish!

name: Harry the Hamster 2: The Quest for the Golden Wheel
description:
Our friend Harry has heard rumors about a mysterious Golden Wheel built by an Egyptian Pharaoh for his precious pet hamster.

The ten parts of the wheel, however, are scattered throughout the world, and so you'll have to help little Harry on his adventure to find this beautiful wheel.

name: Nev's Jam Buster
description: Use Nev's Jam Buster to clear the jam pies coming down towards Nev - make sure they don't reach the bottom or his Jam Buster will get clogged up and Nev will end up covered in Jam.

name: Minecraft: Steven Universe Mash-up
description: Steven enters the Minecraft universe in this Diamond-worthy Mash-up! Contains Steven Universe-themed skins, textures, original music from the show, and all your favorite locations, from Beach City to Homeworld. Believe in Steven!

name: Immortal Game
description:
Immortal Game represents the first ever free-to-play and play-and-earn version of chess with a built-in earning mechanism, and our mission is simple – provide existing chess players with the most nuanced and variable experience available coupled with financial rewards for their skills, while simultaneously introducing the game to an entirely new audience of investors and DeFi / GameFi enthusiasts.

Built on the Ethereum network, the project is available for both mobile phones and PCs, and whilst we were passionate about keeping the core rules of the gameplay unchanged, we have introduced an exciting new element, which will allow players to access fun features and new ways to play that will enhance the gaming experience, as well as maximize earning potential.

name: LEGO Indiana Jones Adventures
description: An auto-scrolling LEGO Indiana Jones game where you must use your mouse pointer to collect treasure and click on obstacles and traps to jump and dodge them!

name: Pool
description:
A game of pool (billiards) developed by William George Brown and Ted Lewis in 1954 on the MIDSAC computer, intended primarily to showcase the computing power of the MIDSAC.

"The game displayed a 2-inch rendition of the pool cue for the players to line up their shots and ran a simulation of the colliding and ricocheting balls in real-time, implementing a full game of a cue ball and 15 frame balls for two players. Graphics were drawn in real-time on a monochrome 13" point plotting X-Y display, the screen being updated by the program 40 times a second (that is, in a normal in-game situations with 2 to 4 balls moving at once). However, for time constraints, the table and its pockets weren’t drawn by the computer graphics, but were rather drawn manually onto the display using a grease pencil."

- Norbert Landsteiner for masswerk.at

name: The VTuber Summit
description: Journey into a world featuring a miscellany of independent VTubers and creators, in this large-scale collaborative VTuber RPG! Fight your way to the Summit through a 100-battle gauntlet, in order to seize your dreams and become the new champion!

name: The Magic Candle
description: The Magic Candle is an action role playing game for the Nintendo Entertainment System.

name: Imaginary Girls Three Kingdoms
description: Sin descripción

name: My Incubi Harem
description: My Incubi Harem is a visual novel about how you became an incubi king and ended up with beautiful men in love with you. Featuring a lewd mentor, a hot singer, a queer dom activist, a cold-hearted nobleman, and a sensible daddy. This is the first episode of a game series made by Male Doll.

name: Demon's Draw
description: Demon's Draw is a push-your-luck card-based game where you summon demons to fight, surprizingly, OTHER DEMONS. Travel through the depth of hell and, upgrade your cards to defeat the increasing foe and absorb their power. May luck be with you...

name: How Long Can You Survive
description: How long can you survive is a survival game that the more time you spend in the same game, the harder it will be to kill the enemies.Try to reach the top of the leaderboards by getting the longest time possible in infinite mode.

name: Ready Set Golf
description: Ready Set Golf is an indie physics-based golf simulator that covers ALL aspects of the real sport. Drive your golf cart to your ball and use your rangefinder to gain information. From there it's up to you to choose the right club and execute the perfect swing. Play with 4 people online!

name: Lewd Delivery
description: Even a shitty courier job might have some advantages - sometimes you might meet a rich lonely woman!

name: Unlimited Fight Ultimate Strike
description: In the best 3D style, a continuation of the first game in the Unlimited Fight series, with improvements in combat mechanics, visuals, stories and much more, immerse yourself in this world full of action, epic and intense battles alone or with friends

name: Slaughter Cats
description: Slaughter Cats is a brutal 3D side scrolling beat'em up platformer combining the chaotic fun of beat'em ups and the skillful precision of classic platformers. Slaughter your enemies in single player, local or online co-op or PVP with up to 4 players in Arcade, Deathmatch or Horde.

name: My Holiness the Gobliness
description: You're a man who fainted on his journey, and was rescued in another world at your final hour by Anubis the Goblin Shaman to be treated at her temple.As her servant, you must take care of the everyday tasks for the lazy shaman.

name: Godfist
description: Godfist is a single-player first person roguelike deck builder, where you have to punch enemies off the tower to progress. Your mission is to climb to the top of the tower and punch god in the face.

name: Strato Breaker
description: STRATO BREAKER is a 3D bullet hell soulslike where you must master realistic reload mechanics and customize your weapon to survive.

name: Rainbow Fish: The Most beautiful Fish in the Ocean
description: Based on the best-seller children's book. Rainbow Fish is an interactive underwater adventure where you can talk and play games with sea creatures.

name: Crown of Thorns
description: An atmospheric, top-down mystery/adventure game. Explore parallel versions of an old castle: one pristine, one ruined. Study scripture and lore, solve riddles, unearth secrets, dispel magic barriers. Find, confront, and defeat what lurks beyond the seal in the throne room.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Christmas Carnage
description: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Christmas themed table with an emphasis on drop targets.

name: Artificial
description: Dig into the truth hidden in the artist's strange paintings through the puzzle.

name: Before the Dawn
description: "Before The Dawn" is a top-down perspective shooting Rougelite game! In a city where a zombie virus suddenly broke out, upgrade weapons, drive vehicles, search for supplies, and activate Signal towers for rescue! Use strategy to combine your equipment and fight your way out of the zombie tide!

name: Sorceress
description: Explore the inside of a sprawling castle where human lives are being sacrificed in the name of science. Sorceress is a first person physics-based action adventure game where you will become a versatile wielder of arcane gadgetry in a highly dynamic environment that rewards wits above raw skill.

name: Numanuin
description: Numanuin Incredible indie horror, a deconstruction of the horror genre. Seemingly simple, but saturated inside Point-and-click in the VHS style.

name: Midnight Survivors
description: Control the super-magic cat to win against the swarming Demon Legion. Spit out bullets and pour out the powerful magic. If that's not enough, sell enemy souls to upgrade your cat.

name: Resttw
description: Restt is an addictive game, which will test how well can you handle your anger and stress. The game is in hand-made graphics with a retro touch. The whole game is inspired by Slovak streamer resttpowered.

name: Adventure Field 5
description: After destroying the calamity king, Edrian reality is broken by his so-called dead father. The kingdom he once knew is gone and everyone with it as no memory of this distant reality. With only him, recalling his former reality, Edrian will have to find a way to get back what may be lost forever.

name: Bad Hop Baseball
description: Baseball crossed with pinball / pachinko. Skill and luck combine in this chaotic casual sports game. A new take on a vintage arcade classic.

name: Sigformation
description: A hardcore puzzle game about digital circuits

name: YoukaiMaki
description: The blood moon has risen once again, meaning the yōkai (cryptids) have emerged from the murky depths of the sea. As the heir to the family restaurant, use your fishing and cooking skills to serve up some delicious yōkai sushi!

name: For the Motherland
description: For The Motherland is a horror game set in a Soviet space station on the brink of collapse. Experience multiple game modes as you uncover the terrifying stories of the station's demise. Can you survive the horrors and uncover the truth? The fate of the Motherland rests in your hands.

name: Boss Fighters
description: Become the VR BOSS to wreak havoc, or join the fight as a PC player in epic battles. Become a futuristic superstar gladiator to compete for valuable loot, ranks, and the crowd's amusement!

name: Anyone There?
description: "Anyone there ?" is a first-person horror game. You are investigating a school where a Creature has been released. Scan the clues and find out his identity before he finds you.

name: Business Empire
description: BUSINESS EMPIRE is a 4X turn-based strategy game that puts you in charge of an ever-expanding company. Design your own products and market them to the masses, set up distribution routes, and develop new technologies.

name: KittenMouse: Summer of Love
description: First Person Shooter, with a full single player campaign and story. Fight through 5 fiery and action packed levels, and enjoy the inspiring story of one man determined to defend his town! Multiple weapon and enemy types.

name: Psionic Awake
description: Psionic Awake is a Roguelike game . Collect resources during the day and defend against monsters at night. It emphasizes any combination of weapons, talents, treasures and partners.

name: Boat Rage
description: Boat Rage - 3d racing game on boats, you drive a boat, dodging mines, crossing checkpoints in time, get to the finish line in time!

name: Oli One: Sneak in
description: Trick the neighbors and take their diamonds!

name: Ojiv
description:
Tear sexy villain's clothes apart! Undress the anime girls with a rhythmic challenge. Win your fights while vibing to catchy music.

Use your quick reflexes and sense of rhythm to tap, hold, spam and swipe your way through each song, earning high scores and unlocking new characters and songs as you progress.

name: Lost Lives
description: Lost Lives is a 2D multiplayer shooter with RPG elements, where you will find yourself in the conditions of post-Soviet devastation. As you progress in the game, you will level up, unlock equipment and customize your character. Choose your gear wisely and go into battle against enemies!

name: Escape From Mystwood Mansion
description: In this first-person puzzle escape room game, you are trapped in the mysterious Mystwood mansion. Explore corridors and find hidden rooms while solving puzzles and deciphering codes to find a way out. Will you escape or linger to uncover the mansion's final secret?

name: Mechahearts
description: Immerse yourself in a world drawn by neural network and invented by a person. Make decisions to change the course of a complex story in this hybrid of visual novel and RPG. Find an answer to the question: what is "humanity" in a world where a mechanical heart can also break?

name: Brink of Death
description: Your goal is to defeat the Killer by destroying his inspired objects. The murderer will subject you to different tortures. Rescue your friends using secrecy and hiding. Eliminate the Killer by racing against the clock to find hidden items.

name: Supermarket Times
description: A surreal supermarket shopping simulation. Explore a strange and thrilling supermarket like no other. Chat with the local "hoi polloi", complete legendary supermarket tasks and buy the products of your wildest dreams!

name: Afterglow
description: A wholesome slice-of-life visual novel. Experience a laidback, character-driven narrative set in an idyllic suburban neighborhood.

name: Demon Dark I
description: Demon Dark I Game is fighting style is a fast two-handed sword fight. Players will control a character who can use both hand-to-hand combat, punching, kicking, punching, archery fighting. and melee combat with a 2-handed sword and use of magic and can summon spirits to help in the fight.

name: Villager's Hideout
description: Villagers Hideout is a comical multiplayer party game for up to 12 players, with hide and seek and tower defense elements. Here the capitalists hide and defend themselves against communist orcs. Turn your friends into Communist orcs or destroy the country with your capitalism and make them go crazy!

name: Mythology Waifus Mahjong
description: Will you be able to defeat all the strong girls? Fight against beautiful mythological warriors in this mythological-themed mix of classic mahjong and combat.

name: Gormadae
description: Gormadae is role-playing board game. Character is taking turn play spinner and then move to destination, in order to save the town being invade by monster. Everyone must work together to save the towns!

name: Holy Paladin Cynthia
description: A classic RPG about one girl's journey to save the world—and become a true Holy Paladin!

name: Blade of Destiny: Enter the Phoenix
description: A story-rich episodic JRPG with a classic 1990’s feel. Experience a huge fantasy game world to explore, character customization, NON-random turn-based combat, and just the right amount of puzzle solving.

name: 100 Hidden Frogs 2
description: 100 hidden frogs 2 is a hidden object game in the magic medieval setting. Colorful 3D graphics. A level that can be viewed from all sides.

name: Jingle Balls
description: Jingle Balls is a Third-Person Multiplayer shooter game where you can play through several different game modes, letting you give the gift of not living this holiday season.

name: Space Academy
description: Space Academy is a story-rich platformer, that offers more than 20 engaging levels, each of them uncovering more secrets of empire academy.

name: Chorus of the Night
description: Fight through hordes of burnt CDs, flying TVs, and faceless suits in this frantic, run-based, twin-stick shooter. Forget firing bullets, though - you'll be flinging vinyl records, throwing drumsticks and swinging guitars to fend off the enemies of music and maybe, just maybe, survive the night.

name: One Night At Barneys 3
description: A survival horror game based off of Five Nights at Freddy's featuring many iconic characters from Barney & Friends. Defend, upgrade, and discover secrets throughout the one night you will spend trapped in a prison.

name: In the Building: Cats 3
description: is a game in which you have to find all the cute cats. Cats will hide in all houses. Search every corner of the room, move the pillows, open the nightstands, check the toilet... Cats can hide in the most unpredictable places.

name: Afterschool Adventurers Club
description: Oh no! An evil Game Master has taken over the school's tabletop role playing club and is terrorizing its members with twisted dungeons and strict rulings! As the new kid in town, do you have what it takes to stop the tyran and bring peace back to the Afterschool Adventurers Club?

name: Pool Cleaning Simulator
description: Pool Cleaning Simulator will give you the chance to become a one-person pool cleanup company that removes pool contamination, replaces filters, the disinfection and sanitizing of the pool environment in an unusual way!

name: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron - Multiplayer Havoc Pack
description:
The first multiplayer character pack for Fall of Cybertron, it unlocks 5 characters and their related parts for use in custom loadouts.
The characters included are Wheeljack, Zeta Prime, Perceptor, Blast Off and Ultra Magnus.

name: Golem Builder
description: Golem Builder is a strategy game where you build a golem to be the best of them all! Build and upgrade your golem with lots of different parts. Ate you ready to become the best of them all?

name: Vampire Rancher
description: Rancher by day, Vampire by night. Manage your time and resources to restore your sleepy little town to its former glory, all while satisfying your vampire needs for blood. Oversee shops and saloons, farm crops and humans, and explore ancient vampiric ruins in the Weird Wild West!

name: Crypto Ball Z
description: Crypto Ball Z is a blockchain game. that has both idle RPG and shooting game elements. Play and Earn with unique Heroes and Commanders!

name: Dive to the Abyssal Void
description: Uncover the secrets of the mysterious and enigmatic hole that has appeared on the planet where the character we manage lives, our goal is to go deeper into the mysterious hole as an investigator and solve the mystery waiting to be uncovered by overcoming all kind of obstacles!

name: Agent Team Simulator
description: Build a team of Elite Secret Agents, and send them on dangerous missions around the globe.

name: Detective Ridelle
description: Detective Ridelle is a cozy murder mystery game featuring escape room style puzzles. Find clues, interrogate suspects, solve the mystery - before it's too late.

name: Australian Football Coach 2023
description: Coach your way to the premiership flag! Australian Football Coach 2023 comes packed with new features including local multiplayer and a database update.

name: Broken Tails
description: Uncover the dark secrets of an abandoned house as you search for your missing kittens in Broken Tails, a psychological horror exploration game. Use your stealth and wit to evade malevolent beings and unravel the disturbing story of animal neglect and other dark themes in this atmospheric experience

name: Linked Worlds
description: Eleven years ago the Dark Beast was sealed by the four heroes. Now, with the heroes nowhere to be seen, it's up to Albus to defeat the Dark Beast before it regains its full powers.

name: Rock Simulator 2
description: Rock Simulator 2 is a multiplayer, meditative idle game with many secrets to uncover. Begin your journey in the rocky tundra to relax and earn stones to unlock rocks, environments, ambients, or weather presets!

name: Something Amazing Room
description: This game is not normal. It has no traditional objectives or traditional gameplay. In the game, you explore the world and community of the things that own the space you explore, named Meeple's. You learn about who they are, and what the world is.

name: Paratives
description: Paratives is a 1-4 players ghost hunting indie horror game where you'll have to use your detective skills to gather clues and evidences. Paratives offers a thrilling and immersive experience that will test your skills and keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: Sakura Mirror
description: Sakura adores her reflection in the mirror! She admires her beauty and tenderness in the mirror. She takes care of herself for hours in front of the mirror and she applies make-up.

name: Street's Disciple
description: A battle platform fighter for a single player versus 3 computer controlled characters. You play as a street disciple ninja and the ninjas are at war with each other. Punch and Kick and show that you're top ninja and can lead the group to be their new ninja master of Streets Disciple Ninja Edition.

name: Paranoia Party
description: An online party game where you need to find and kill your friends that hide among a group of NPC's.

name: Swarm Horror
description: Swarm Horror is a survival horror game in which the player must progress while defeating insects. The goal of the game is to escape from the feeding ground of the insects you have wandered into. The insects call their friends to feed on you.

name: Dig Dig Boom
description: Dig Dig Boom is a turn-based puzzle platformer with chess-like physics. Combine mining techniques to explore an underground world of riches. Every ore is a test of problem-solving and an opportunity to die to poorly placed dynamite. Blast through randomized caves, handcrafted caves or make your own!

name: Pirates Journey
description: You and your crew have been shipwrecked on a tropical island in the late 1600s. At the beginning of the adventure, you find yourself with only a few basic supplies, including ropes, sticks, and stones. With skill and cunning, you can survive on the island and thrive as a pirate crew.

name: HugeHead
description: You are driving home to your parents' house. Suddenly, a human-like shadow jumps out and he slams on the brakes in a panic. But he fails to do so in time, and runs over the shadow. He gets out of the car and checks the road, but only a pool of blood continues to the mountain road.

name: Distant Sun
description: A sci-fi game based on character dialogue and choices. Uncover the mysteries of Pioneer Station by attempting diplomacy and seeking peace or gunning through those that stand against you. The decisions you make will have an impact on the ending.

name: Stressed Out
description: Nothing better than smashing stuff in VR when you're stressed out.

name: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron - Dinobot Destructor Pack
description:
The second multiplayer character pack for Fall of Cybertron that unlocks 4 characters and their related parts for use in custom loadouts.
The characters included are Grimlock, Slug, Snarl and Swoop.

name: Fox of the moon
description: Fox of the moon is a virtual reality game that will take you on an epic adventure with Akami, a white fox with supernatural powers.

name: Mite
description: Mite is a horror game, with few mechanics, in which you play a hiker who has lost his family in a cursed forest in Japan... find your family and escape from the forest, while being chased by strange folklore creatures Japanese.

name: Medieval towers
description: Medieval towers is a strategy game in which you play as the leader of a magical squad and have an exciting military adventure.

name: The Will of Arthur Flabbington
description: A comedy point-and-click adventure game about a dead uncle, a hidden treasure, a reluctant ghost sidekick, old people and pizza.

name: Shark Rain
description: The very first Shark-Based Shooter game! Become a cute shark-girl and speed through water then emerge in human form and blast your enemies to oblivion! Nowhere will they be safe, not even on land!

name: Cosmogonic
description: Cosmogonic is a 10 minute interactive science fiction animated short. It is the first VR experience inspired by the famous Polish science-fiction writer Stanisław Lem. This adaptation of a 1964 novel speaks perfectly to today’s world, where populism and disinformation threaten democracy.

name: Alien Xenocide
description: Alien Xenocide is an action-packed, retro platformer featuring explosive gameplay, arcade callbacks with modern twists, and a sense of humor. Fast paced platforming, aliens, and a babelicious babe — what's not to like?

name: Think It Up
description: Uncover mysteries and solve puzzles in an immersive ambient atmosphere. Think It Up uses the power of a full-body haptic VR suit to pull you into an interactive world. As you make your escape to the surface, uncover the secrets of your underground adventure and piece together the story of your past.

name: Proving Grounds
description: Proving Grounds is a Turn Based Tactical Auto Battler set in a medieval fantasy world. Proving Grounds uses pixel art, a unique code based auto battler combat system, humor, and more easter eggs from movies and games than you can count to deliver a unique RPG experience.

name: Ball Punchers
description: Ball Punchers is a high-intensity, fast-paced, beat 'em-up party game. Fight your friends and ruin friendships!

name: Scions: Battle Eternal
description: Become the Scion, an evergrowing weapon of destruction of the Elders! In this action roguelike, crush the endless hordes to evolve your scion, combine skills to create new ones, unlock new maps, character classes, talents and more…

name: Sugar Tanks
description: Sugar Tanks is an intense, fast-paced, and super sweet tank shooter game. It is fun, looks cute, is addicting, and is a hell of a lot more difficult at the end than you would imagine. Be ready for a colorful, caries-inducing bullet-hell twin-stick shooter like no other.

name: Spellsphere
description: Spellsphere is a fast-paced action roguelike set in the far future where society has reverted to an era similar to the medieval ages. You play as a mage locked up in a dungeon while an evil sorcerer has taken over the island. Can you escape the dungeon, travel the island, and defeat the Sorcerer?

name: Ricky's Rockin' Arcade
description: Ricky’s Raccoon’s Rockin’ Arcade allows in person hangouts to gain a digital dimension giving you a virtual arcade to hang out in, and turn an ordinary game night into something unforgettable!

name: World of Fate
description: World of Fate is a massive strategy game where you spend your time taking over real life buildings and establishing your empire on the real life map. The game uses super advanced tech to provide real time street data and building data to create all the terrain and play space.

name: Flife
description: Experience the challenge of climbing with a knife all the way to the top! Flip your favorite knife to climb up dynamic landscapes.

name: Magic Staves
description: Magic Staves - 2D strategy in the Tower Defense genre, the main task of which is to resist the onslaught of countless monsters of the powers of darkness. Place various defensive towers along the perimeter of the attack line and spend money on construction wisely, because your success depends on it!

name: Sushi Clicker
description: A clicker game revolving around Sushi! Create sushi, Sell sushi and buy upgrades in an endless cycle to continue creating infinite sushi to become the ultimate sushi chef!

name: Sodaman
description: Sodaman, he's a space agent. He must stop the hostile aliens trying to destroy the universe and save the carbonated drinks they destroyed. Maybe you should help him out?

name: Knight Flight
description: KNIGHT FLIGHT is a physics-based adventure game set in medieval times. Fling your heroes across the screen to smash obstacles, defeat enemies and solve puzzles. Can you solve all 30 levels and stand victorious in the final boss fight?

name: Sokoball Dreams
description: Sokoball Dreams is a minimalist puzzle game. The goal is to beat all the puzzles using the least possible moves.

name: Resistance Forces
description: Save the areas seized by creatures. Complete all tasks and take over the area. Investigate the area and report the results.

name: File Destined
description: Can this last case of Oliver, all be just a small part of a bigger picture? Gather clues, unravel the mystery behind the case and uncover the truth.

name: Conquer: Napoleonic Wars
description: A turn-based strategy game based off the Napoleonic Wars! Lead, attack, buy, and communicate. Learn how to play difficult 4x grand strategy games by starting with simple strategy. *Disclaimer, this game is made by a teenager for a school project*

name: Cthuloot
description: CTHULOOT is a cooperative arcade game for 2 to 4 players in which you explore strange places filled with treasures to collect. Cooperation, agility and cthonic chanting will be required to solve the mysteries that await you. But watch out for tentacles!

name: Chucky: The Road To Heaven
description: Chucky:TRTH is a 3D, action-adventure, jumping puzzle game. You a cute demon trying to reach heaven all the way from hell. Travel through many different locations, filled with monsters, puzzles, traps, hidden objects etc. Will you reach your goal or fail? That is for you to find out.

name: Lost Abroad Café
description: Lost Abroad Café: a language learning game that puts you in the role of a virtual café owner in another country. Learn and use your new language to serve your customers and grow your business. Try it now on Steam Early Access!

name: See You Later
description: There are so many things I want to do with the rest of my life. Like dreaming with you, laze around with you, look at the moon, eat rice with you, go on the biggest wedding trip to Antarctica, and most importantly - say goodbye to you.

name: Energy Fighters
description: Take to the stars to defend the earth from a vengeance fueled AI determined to destroy our civilisation. The year is 2344 and only a fleet of 5 Energy Fighters remain to hold off the AI attack. Utilize shield polarity defending to absorb enemy shots and re-energise your own ship.

name: Axium's Box
description: Climb, FALL, Die! is the theme of Axium's Box, a game that draws inspiration from "Getting Over It" and "Jumper King," while taking it to a whole new level with stunning 3D graphics. If you enjoy pain, frustration, challenging obstacles, and, paradigm shifts then Axium's Box is the game for you.

name: Swords & Bones 3
description: The Swords & Bones saga reaches its third chapter! Inspired by past classics 2D action-platformer games, get ready to fight your way through more than 50 levels full of with enemies, traps and pitfalls. RPG elements enrich the gaming experience.

name: Glitch Party
description: Glitch Party is a party game for 2-8 players online. Challenge your friends in different minigames, each with a small chance of being glitched. Welcome to Glitch Party!

name: Infestus
description: A Kingdom in turmoil, a rising darkness in the North, will you take on the challenges ahead?

name: Elven Battlegrounds
description: Elven Edge combines medieval combat and fun PVP game modes in a beautiful Elven Toon world.

name: Metal Glove: Exodus
description: Metal Glove: Exodus is a top-down dungeon crawler inspired by the classics. Hack and slash your way through the dungeon on your journey to defeat the evil Rock Troll within!

name: Brutal Strike
description: Brutal Strike is a multiplayer shooter. Fight as two teams and show off your shooting skills to give your team the edge in combat.

name: Zombie Squad
description: Zombie Squad, a casual game, combines tower defense and rogue like. The operation of the game is very simple, and the characters can fight automatically, just click to release their skills.

name: Snowbrawll
description: An epic snowball fight between 2-6 players, both online and local multiplayer. Grow your snowball and use different power-up's to knock your friends out! Are you ready to Brawll?

name: Maid Hunter
description: this is survive game In a city of humanity that has been destroyed by excessive machine saturation in the future, let's destroy dangerous machines with the aim of rebuilding mankind. You will be able to easily destroy machines by purchasing weapons, raising skills.

name: Alexios the Protector
description: Only you can save the world from Xor's evil plans... Go on an adventure, become stronger and thwart the plans of evil.

name: Slime Evolution
description: A survival roguelike where you play a slime wandering a forest. As you eat resources and fight monsters, you evolve and get ever stronger! But as you unbalance the forest and draw attention of stronger opponents, how long can you survive?

name: After Stream
description: After Stream is a first-person psychological horror game. You will take on the role of a streamer who returns home to stream, but something goes wrong..

name: Sker Ritual: Goon Brenn
description: Haunt Sker Island with the infamous phantom black cat, Goon Brenn and become the beast of Sker Island, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles: Dwarves
description: Tenacious and resourceful, the dwarves feel most at home in their cavernous mountain strongholds. Their ingenious machines are the envy of all who behold them.

name: Lobby Cam by Bryn Oh
description: An immersive short story walking simulator. Find diary pages to uncover the narrative behind a man who discovers a new channel on his TV. A melancholy story about the grey etiquette of technology.

name: Kingdom Run VR
description: Kingdom Run VR is an action-packed fitness games; explore trapped tombs, avoid dangers, collect gems & eliminate enemies!

name: Faster than Backrooms
description: Outrun the deadly backrooms as you navigate procedurally generated levels, battle terrifying creatures, and gather powerful items. Get more efficient with each attempt, pushing yourself to become Faster than Backrooms.

name: Fight Plane
description: "Fight Plane" is a hard-core clear-cut shooting air combat game. Players control the fighter plane to shuttle through the sky full of bullets. While improving the fighter plane's ability, challenge powerful enemies at the same time!!!

name: Escape From School: F.E.L.I.K
description: Welcome to the Chernobyl Lyceum. Try to get out of it, but there is only one way out: blow up the reactor by reaching the control panel. But be careful, reactor guardian F.E.L.I.K. if he sees you, he will do everything to eliminate you.

name: Oak Adventure the Maze
description: You are Oak a Man From Another Dimension Who are Summoned For Saving This Crumbling World by Adventuring and Solving Mysteries Through Labyrinths.

name: Battle of Orion 10: First contact
description: A hundred years have passed since the events on Cronos X transpired. The USN have not taken the warnings from Cronos to heed and is unprepared for the onslaught of the alien armada. Now, you must take point in fighting the brutal alien armada that is tearing through the outer rims!

name: The Starbites: Taste of Desert
description: The story of a girl's growth and adventure on a vast desert planet, "Bitter."

name: Hentai Jigsaw Puzzle Collection: Christmas Edition
description: Enjoy the jigsaw puzzles with high quality sexy hentai girls that our Christmas themed Move the puzzle pieces to make the complete image More then 14 different jigsaw puzzles to complete

name: Kiss Effect
description: Space... Boundless space with secrets, beauty, and icy calm. At a distance of hundreds of light years, there is no shelter around except for your spaceship... It is your home, it is your place of relaxation and love...

name: CFG: Combat for General
description: CFG: Combat for General is a creative simulation game in the background of three kingdoms period of China. Thousands of Generals waited for recruited, and thousands of cities waited for occupied. Start your journey right now!

name: Paradise Cleaning!: Married Woman Cosplay Life
description: Paradise Cleaning!: Married Woman Cosplay Life - is super-casual action game. All you have to do is just cleaning out all dirty icons by dragging over them within the time limit. There are 5+1 dirty icons and each of them can be cleaned by the corresponding Cleaning tools.

name: Colors’ Heartbeat
description: A roguelite game that combines turn-based command battles and card games. Collect cards and reach the ending.

name: Trap of Musk: Asia Night
description: The target of the mission, who is in pursuit of the poignant love with the heroine of Legend of the White Snake. And the client, who is a real flirt. One is calm and never doubts others, while the other is kind and nice to everyone. Who is it that indulges in the game of pampering--?

name: Frogvival
description: You are what you eat indeed and in Frogvival you can really experience that assessment. Frogvival is a survival game where you can devour animals to mutate into them!

name: Embracing Darkness
description: "Embracing Darkness" is a fan visual novel in which players can enjoy a short encounter with Local Villains Tiefedorf and Shuraomaru.

name: Mariam Game
description: Mariam Game is a narrative game, set in a fantasy version by help her get back to her home, where your choices impact the fate of you and Mariam. "Survival Horror", "Puzzle" and "Clicker" and get story hints by playing "Cards Mode" and completing all the levels.

name: Heroes of Drakerealm
description: Gather friends, fight dragons, learn new skills, and save the world in this turn-based adventure inspired by classic JRPGs.

name: Nikka: Rise
description: Climbing from the bottom to the top is the pursuit of most people. Use your ability to prove that you are the strongest.

name: Aether: Wizard Life
description: Aether Wizard Life is a magical and adventurous wizard Farm Sim game packed with exciting Action Adventures.

name: XenoFeud
description: XenoFeud is an insane top-down arcade alien shooter, where you must survive hordes of alien intruders while defending a mysterious object in space.

name: Mystery Trackers: Fall of Iron Rock - Collector's Edition
description: You’ve been sent to Iron Rock to find your long-lost colleague. But your trip quickly takes a turn for the bizarre when you find the town patrolled by the new Mayor’s robots, trapping the residents inside! Do you have what it takes to help them and escape before it’s too late?

name: Kitten Lost Her Box
description: Help tiny Kitten get back her favorite paper box only with her agile actions. In this tight platformer kitten brave hand-crafted challenges, meet cute creatures and finally fight with her old enemy!

name: CrossLust
description: The year is 1989, Brian Kendo is woken up by a loud and quite mysterious knocking sound against a metallic door. However there's one problem, this isn't Brian's home; in fact, Brian isn't sure where he is.

name: Miracle Sweeper
description: A casual mini puzzle game! Please kill time!

name: Fortune Handlers
description: Fortune Handlers is a mix of a classic RPG and CCG. In the game, instead of cards with different abilities, you define the actions of the characters by rolling dice. Each dice has various effects on its faces.

name: PetShop
description: "PetShop" is the app that exports VRM format avatars with pets & items. Dogs, cats, sharks, squirrels, elephants, dragons, and many other animals. You can also use animal ears, tails and hats. The exported avatars can be used in VRM compatible metaverse. Join the Metaverse with "PetShop"!

name: Librarium
description: In Librarium, you can learn subjects from Medical Terminology to the History of Ancient China. We use study techniques like the Memory Palace and mnemonics to help our users improve their memory and study techniques. There are also community decks being added every week!

name: ZaBaTa!
description: Play Hide and Seek with AI and humans - Find out who is pretending to be an AI!

name: Kitty Survivors: Rogues of Catmere
description: Kitty Survivors is a funny action rogue-lite game where you slay hordes of creatures, create overpowered builds, use elemental skills and craft stupid weapons. Join a growing guild of misfits with a thirst for milk, hired to protect the Kingdom of Catmere!

name: Spellrain
description: Survive the spellrain disaster that has turned the world into a magical land filled with cute monsters. Buy spells, craft armor and upgrade your base to restore peace in Spellrain.

name: Rayland 2
description: Welcome to Rayland. The inhabitants of this island use the energy coming from the laser beams to survive and to transport this energy they use the repeating cubes.

name: Colorless
description: Colorless In this puzzle and platform game, players must manipulate the perspective of the game world to solve increasingly complex puzzles.

name: Alpaca Rancher
description: Tame, Farm, Forage and Explore in the wonderful world of Alpaca Rancher! Collect and care for a variety of unique alpacas. Cultivate crops to grow for your ranch. Forage for resources to help your neighbors and find exciting items! Explore the world to find new friends, alpacas and more!

name: Divided Skies
description: Divided Skies is a Third-Person Flight combat game where you play as an outlawed Cyborg who flies around on a Hover bike to complete several missions where you fight a private military force owned by the rich in this divided Eco futuristic Mumbai in the year 2100

name: Minibots TD
description: It's defense time! Arrange your forces against the invading Robotic tribe called the Kaids. Choose your arsenal and place them wisely for excellent road defense. Prove your defenses against challenging enemies.

name: Paraopticon
description: Paraopticon is an Observation Duty / Puzzle Game Style mix. Try to spot all anomalies and report them so you don´t die.Make it till 6 AM and you survive.

name: The Cloud Bazaar
description: The Cloud Bazaar is an interactive therapeutic game designed with and for players with pediatric spinal muscular atrophy (SMA). Players are on a mission to stop the floating city from falling into the ocean. The sky pirates are threatening to steal the city’s only way to stay afloat.

name: Heroes
description: A 2D Platformer RPG game clear the stages quickly as you can. Be the fastest.

name: Space Scavenger 2
description: Space Scavenger 2 is an Action-Roguelike where you scavenge for modules to build a hodgepodge spaceship. Upgrade and customize your ship on-the-fly to make the best of a terrible situation. Playful and colorful - who said you can't smack aliens with a huge hammer in space?

name: Solid River
description: Immerse yourself in a game where survival MMORPG meets RTS. Building your kingdom, craft, trade, keep your people happy, socialize, fight, protect them and survive this ambitious and dangerous world in this realistic adventure.

name: Tofas Sahin: Online Car Driving
description: Drift in the city with the multiplayer tofas sahin game.

name: Paranormal Cleanup
description: Paranormal Cleanup is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. This is no ordinary clean-up job. You are employees of a cleaning company tasked with cleaning up a haunted house. Take out the trash, but don't get caught by the ghosts that haunt the place!

name: Sky High Games Horror Collection
description: This is The Sky High Games Horror Collection. With this collection you will have 5 survival horror games to choose from. That can be played in any order.

name: Animal Kingdom
description: Welcome to Animal Kingdom, a hidden animal game where you collect pawprints, cameras and coins while searching animals in fantastic locations! With 3 game modes and trivias between the chapters, Animal Kingdom will provide hours of fun for Hidden Object fans in surreal settings!

name: Jump Tale
description: Jump Tail is a simple 2D Platformer with 10 different playable “Characters”. It's your Goal to finish all the 110 Levels with the best possible time and the least possible deaths.

name: Fool's Gold: Dice, Death & Dating
description: Fool's Gold: Dice, Death & Dating is a TTRPG-inspired dating adventure game in which you, a daring adventurer, dive into the world's deadliest jungle to get a hot date for the annual Bundariko Ball.

name: Asian Food Cart Tycoon
description: Grow your satay business and become the most successful satay entrepreneur in the world!

name: Balloon Man
description: Action, Puzzle, Soulslike, Platform

name: MathCar
description: In MathCar, players can race against each other or themselves by using math problem-solving skills to control their car. This cross-platform game combines competitive racing with math education, making it an engaging and effective way for kids and adults alike to improve their math fact proficiency.

name: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron - Massive Fury Pack
description:
The third multiplayer character pack for Fall of Cybertron, it unlocks 6 characters and their related parts for use in custom loadouts.
The characters included are Autobot Hound, G1 Retro Optimus Prime, Sharpshot, Hardshell, Kickback and Bruticus

name: Master of Chess
description: Make the right moves and become World Chess Champion! Develop your skills and opening repertoire in this chess player management game. Apply the right strategy to win matches and climb the rating ladder to become the best chess player the world has ever seen.

name: The Beekeeper's Picnic
description: Beekeeper (and former world’s greatest detective) Sherlock Holmes is arranging a surprise picnic for his friend Watson. Unfortunately pesky mysteries keep getting in the way! Explore, find clues and interrogate your neighbours in this cosy point and click adventure!

name: Out of Three
description: Out of Three is a local multiplayer Boss Rush game that can be played with 3 players. The goal: defeat the Boss Gorgone by cooperating with your team members. You and your 2 faithful comrades find yourselves in an unknown dungeon, face to face with a giant medusa. Your fate seems inevitable!

name: Crazy World VR
description: Crazy World VR offers various mini-games you can play with others online, together with social & customization features.

name: AIT
description: AIT is an open-world FPS adventure with RPG elements that challenges you to fight and explore in a mysterious and atmospheric setting.

name: Intra: Tower Defense
description: Intra needs you. Someone must be chosen to save the spirit tree, when the council made its choice, the tree already made its own choice.

name: Fast Coffee Simulator
description: A casual simulation game where you make coffee

name: Dice & Spells
description: Dice & Spells is a 2D hand-drawn dark fantasy game based on combat mechanics using random incidents. Immerse yourself in turn-based gameplay and progress through the levels, upgrading heroes and dice. Face the undead mythical creatures, and don't die too fast. Are you willing to take risks?

name: Treachery in Beatdown City: Ultra Remix
description: The massive update to Treachery in Beatdown City!

name: The Immolate
description: You will be subjected to the savagery of the spirit possessed by the devil. Try to get out of the old house you were trapped in! Retro survival horror game in the 90s

name: Netherverse
description: Netherverse is a Free-to-play, Third-person, Team-based, 3v3 Multiplayer Deathmatch online game set in a dystopian world. Team up, choose a class & fight to survive. Discover our unique world shifting mechanic, as well as the Human & the Nether worlds.

name: Samurai Legacy
description: Samurai Legacy is an oriental-themed roguelike deckbuilder. Play as a warrior samurai and build your deck to face epic challenges and enemies. Customize your character and evolve to become the most powerful warrior samurai. It's perfect for strategy game enthusiasts.

name: Upgrader
description: A Top down action adventure upgrading rougelike, which introduces alot of ways to create the ultimate upgrader! Lots of customization with pets weapons and accessory's.

name: Leak
description: Leak is a psychological horror game. Except when you return home your family are missing, and there is a corpse of an unknown man hanging from a ceiling in your study. Explore the house and the area, solve riddles and hide from monsters, for saving your family. Be careful - you are being watched.

name: Hug Survivor
description: Love-filled survivor rogue-like shooter ♡. Hug and bind the nuisances that spawn crazy chicks! Kick out the mass-produced chicks with the nimble hugging action of the cute threesome!

name: Running Robot Man 4
description: Parasail over lava, shoot monsters with your laser, and explore procedurally generated dungeons with your friends. An action-adventure roguelike made in Unreal Engine.

name: Ready, Steady, Ship!
description: Grab a buddy for this chaotic couch co-op puzzler. Use various tools and equipment to assemble the most efficient conveyor belts to keep the goods flowing. Supports single-player but is best played in 2-player couch coop.

name: Vlobs
description: A relaxing casual puzzle game all about placing, connecting and popping vlobs.

name: Long Steel
description: 20 years after the defeat of the Shaper of Magic, Warlock, the island of Melas is in a time of peace. But when the dark cult known as the Wicken return to resurrect Warlock from his ashes, you must spring into action to stop them before the apocalypse is set into motion.

name: Trainz Plus: Midwestern Rails
description: Hills, forests, countryside - all to be expected in the Midwest. Operate long freights, stop at each station with Amtrak, or run locals and service the industries over this 420+ mile route. With over 71 industries to be serviced, you’ll be running trains for hours non-stop.

name: Pirates Gold
description: Pirates Gold - This is a 2D platform game where you play as a young pirate who decided to take all the gold for himself.

name: Light and Shadow: Doppelganger
description: In this cruel world, Rora's originally happy life is over in a flash. In order to repay the kindness of her adoptive parents, she resolutely embarks on the path of revenge. Will she become a revered paladin or an assassin of darkness?

name: NanoWar: Cells vs. Virus
description: Fight against the viruses and cure the entire body! A face-paced real time strategy game of cell conquest. Loads of players have already got the bug... ready to defend your cells?

name: Fairy Biography 3: Obsession
description: An casual strategy game. By using the demon pot to lure, the naughty demon spirits will be fooled and show their feet. Players use the left mouse button to click to control the demon refining pot, so that the demon refining pot can rebound reasonably and successfully defeat the enemy.

name: Omsi 2: Coach O560 Series
description: Coach O560 Series – add-on for Omsi 2 is a pack of legendary coaches intended for intercity lines and medium distance lines. Add on include 12 main versions that differ lengths, interior equipment, engines, Euro V versions to Euro VI Facelift versions.

name: Hunt: Showdown - Frau Perchta
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter with two variations, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Perchta: Dawn (Hunter), Perchta: Dusk (Hunter), Midwinter Tusk (Martini-Henry IC1), Unkempt (LeMat Mark II), and The Avalanche (Frag Bomb).

name: HeadAche: Visual Novel
description: Dima's obscure past keeps him busy. He is often disturbed by prolonged headaches. It's up to you to find out what secret Dima is hiding from his friends, and what's behind it.

name: Can't Escape the Backrooms
description: Can't Escape the Backrooms is a horror game that you can play single player or with up to 4 friends. Explore numerous treacherous and dangerous levels, avoid contact with evil entities, and do whatever it takes to find your way out!

name: Voidside
description: Voidside is a high-octane Parkour FPS in which you jump around locations pulled out of time, unlock strange new weapons and fight mysterious threats all while trying to get a high score!

name: Typing de Ai wo Tsutae yo
description: This game is for Japanese only. Typing de Ai wo Tsutae yo is a typing game for Japanese. Players must type poop-related words as quickly and accurately as possible. Even if you are not good at typing, you can have fun practicing with this game.

name: Property Pro
description: Build or purchase a property and manage it effectively. Make strategic decisions to maintain and improve the property, and address any issues that arise.

name: Jump de Pon
description: Just keep climbing. Avoid falling rocks, climb cliffs and reach the goal. This game is a time attack type 3D action game that challenges you to reach the goal as fast as possible with simple controls.

name: Yayla
description: Yayla is a story-based open world action adventure game set in the Karan,the land of natural beauty and bad people.

name: MakeRoom
description: Make miniature dioramas using hundreds of objects! Create a compact kitchen, a comfortable living room or a cozy nook to read books - the choice is yours!

name: Sekisai Puzzle Action
description: Side-scrolling puzzle action game

name: Zero-G-Racer
description: FPV arcade simulator, drone racing with onboard weapons and ammo for fun piloting. Real-life driving scenarios for the simulator side.

name: Ozymandias: Indonesia
description: Including a new map: Indonesia!

name: The Day Before You Gone
description: A visual novel that breaks stereotypes. A psychological experiment that confronts the struggles of one. The story of a girl with magical powers who has lost her sweetheart. Will she have a chance to turn back time? It's up to you!

name: Stories Want to Be Told Storyone: Prophecy
description: Stories Want to be Told is an adventure game. It is more like an interactive story telling game. This the first episode The Prohecy

name: Dungeon Renovation Simulator
description: Dungeon Renovation Simulator offers a unique adventure where you step into the shoes of a “Cursed Goblin” cleaner and renovator in a medieval-inspired world. In this single-player simulation game, you’ll explore, clean and revive intriguing environments, each with its own set of physics-based challenges and hidden quests.

name: Deadly Platform
description: Lots of challenges and meaningful journey that comes with beating parkours waits for you with 3D and Third-Person camera. Not every obstacle is easy, watch out!

name: Traffic Brains 2
description: Fix urban traffic issues by placing road signs and programming traffic light patterns. Create green lanes, and divert traffic!

name: Downbass Warriors: Heroes of Maydamn
description: DownBass Warriors: Heroes of MayDamn (DWHOM) is a hardcore first-person shooter with nice physics, a trouble-free, enjoyable shooting and an advanced character injury systems. A unique, one of a kind character armor customization system was also introduced in the game . So what are you waiting for?

name: Oceancatch
description: A turn based strategy Game like no other fire your buoy clamp to clear the pool (note*spike ball and bomb balls you want to avoid to stay in the game.)Use left and right to reel buoy back.

name: Survive in Moldova
description: Try to survive in the poorest country in Europe, lead the revolutionary movement and solve all the problems of the state.

name: Fatherhood
description: An atmospheric, war survival experience, with an opportunity to see wars from the perspective of innocent people. Telling the tale of the SACRIFICE of a father, Fatherhood provides the player with the hardest ever dilemmas of an everlasting catastrophe called WAR inside the Middle East.

name: Dukes Up
description: Dukes Up is a 2D action platformer which harkens back to the 8-bit games of yesterday.

name: One Tap Golf VR
description: ONE TAP GOLF VR brings a fresh new experience to your headset with sixty levels divided into stages of three for you to enjoy ! Every stage you play , you will have three hearts to survive three levels. If you miss three times, you go back to the beginning of the stage !

name: Connected Hearts: The Musketeers Saga - Collector's Edition
description: Love can help you overcome many obstacles, even if the fate of an entire kingdom is at stake! Can two heroes in love make it through? Find out in this game!

name: Office Girls and Games
description: In this Visual Novel, you'll join Chloe and Jessie in the popular mobile game, Isekai Online. Eliminate arguments and disagreements in this strange duo and lead them to victory!

name: Crochet Cavalcade
description: Crochet Cavalcade is an adult visual novel series, with an expansive cast of characters and unique scenarios! Chapters will be published frequently, and each new story adds another intertwining link into the ever developing world!

name: The Klown
description: The Klown is a 2D Open World Sandbox game inspired on the very good Metroidvania genre titles. Talk, Run, Explore. Find secret passages and characters and discover a Dark Fantasy World full of secrets. Can you find The Klown before your Time runs out?

name: Guts 'n Grunts
description: Inspired by games like Contra and Turrican, Guts 'n Grunts is a mid-paced action game with lots of shooting, swimming, and rolling. Find power-ups. Earn upgrades. Fight for pig freedom!

name: Unknown Pyramid
description: A roguelike horror game set in a randomly generated labyrinth. Escape from the complex labyrinth of pyramids while running from unknown entity that lurks in the labyrinth!

name: Head Basketball: Samir of Morocco
description: This dlc unlocks Samir character for Head Basketball.

name: Not For Broadcast: Live & Spooky
description: Direct the "Live & Spooky" paranormal investigation team around a derelict film studio deep underneath Channel One. Frame the shots, capture the action and help keep viewers on the edge of their seats with some TV magic. After all, these ghost shows are all just a hoax... right?

name: Throwia
description: Welcome to the next-generation MMO world of Throwia... Design your character as you wish, choose the weapons that suit your play style, level up, and get stronger... For new equipment, blast or dig your opponents... Build your team and reach the top of the rankings!

name: Nightmare Diary: Chapter One
description: Nightmare Diary puts you in the shoes of Kohaku Suzuki, a young college girl who sets out to not only find out what happened to her after a bout of amnesia, but also to find out the truth of who was responsible for a mysterious car accident. Can you figure out what happened?

name: Doodle World: Deluxe
description:
Doodle World Deluxe includes the original version of Doodle World and the all-new game, Doodle World Redrawn!

Doodle World features an innovative "Kids Mode". With "Kids Mode" younger players can enjoy the game with more lives, less levels, and easier enemies and bosses!

Doodle World Redrawn is a new, never before released, re-imagining of Doodle World with tougher levels, enemies, and bosses! Use the new double jump ability to navigate through these tougher levels. "Kids Mode" is still available in this new version, so even younger players can enjoy this new game!

The music and sound design for Doodle World Deluxe was created by the extremely talented chiptune artist Takumi Grainger!

name: Project Tower
description: Dive in Project Tower, a third-person shooter mixing intense bullet hell combat with a unique morphing ability. Imprisoned by the "Hiks", fight to the top of their deadly tower for freedom. Will you outsmart them and make your way out ?

name: Toaster Arena
description: Toaster Arena is a first person multiplayer arena shooter where players battle it out on different maps and game modes. Use Advanced movement to traverse obstacles or hop on some wheels and create carnage

name: Handless show
description: Welcome to TV-show. Play and enjoy before the guillotine cut off your hand. Be prepared to put your skills and reflexes to the test in the many mini-games!

name: The Last Escape
description: The Last Escape is a 2D side-scrolling platform shooter with puzzle and exploration elements.

name: Indecent Wife Hana: Gravure
description: A visual novel about sharing your wife. Play as the husband, and receive erotic photos of your wife taken by another man. How far would she go during the sessions?

name: Dolly Wars: Auto Tactics - Holiday Nightmares Campaign
description: The unpleasant dreams of the holidays have descended upon the Dolly world in, “Holiday Nightmares,” a new chapter for campaign mode in Dolly Wars – Auto Tactics! Play through the stages and face off against ax wielding barbarians, fearsome bomb guys, powerful elite gunners, and even Santa Claus!

name: Glory to the Robots!
description: A game in the genre of management strategy. Here you can build your own factory for the production of robots, and on another planet, and extract resources and test robots on other different planets.

name: Wet Sand
description: Erotic visual novel about adventures of Fabian Brook and his crew in Savage Waters. Explore the world with unique creatures and choose a beloved woman.

name: Fever
description: "Fever" - an ongoing dev project to create a Co-op / PvP multiplayer zombie survival looter shooter.

name: Outlanders: Flood and Fire
description: In the northern regions, across its icy valleys and jagged peaks, five clans of vicious mountain folk live in constant rivalry. When a sudden rise in water level forces them to start anew in the upper regions of the mountains, they will have to adopt more sustainable habits in order to survive.

name: Quantum:Fantasy
description: Quantum:Fantasy is a multiplayer RPG with an emphasis on hunting monsters. Combat is tight and responsive, varying based on chosen class: of the four, each has different weapons and skills to use in and out of combat. Level up, upgrade armor and weapons, and tailor each class to play how you like!

name: Love Menu
description: Love Menu is a visual novel game about a romance between a young man and a waitress. It has immersive story, interactive choices, and mini-game events that enhance the characters and influence the relationship. The beautiful artwork will keep you entertained and invested in the story.

name: Lillian Night: Exclusive Contract of Succubus
description: Succubus-themed 3D animated visual novel with VR support

name: Mythlands: Dragon Flight
description: The Ultimate Dragon Riding Experience

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Lovers
description: Puzzle lovers rejoice!

name: Lost Oliver
description: Lost Oliver is a puzzle game heavily inspired by Pokémon. Control little Oliver's mother and use her special abilities to clear the way and rescue her lost baby.

name: Kidnapped in Vostok
description: Brrr! A freezing cold wakes you up and your eyes are slowly opening on a huge storage building. But where are you?! And why are you tied to a toboggan?! And this man who comes closer to ask you if you are comfortable, is he kidding you?! Anyways, except from nodding, you can't really do anything...

name: Codex Lost
description: The new open world, spellcasting action-RPG. The grimoires have been stolen, civilisation is in ruins. Rise, Curator! Craft ancient elemental magics and challenge the great lords who threaten to fracture reality itself.

name: Ghost's Timepeices
description: "There is no Meanings of Time for Ghosts." A new world of ghost and human. A Mysterious Traveler leap the time, travel through the world, solve the puzzle, and chasing the Past...

name: No Love Lost
description: A luscious planet with a coveted resource. A booming black market that pays generously. Weigh the risks and watch your back in a battle between two raider crews. With Blending elements of PvPvE and competitive questing, No Love Lost takes you on a dangerous adventure at every turn!

name: Aery: The Lost Hero
description: Aery: The Lost Hero is a story-driven, narrative 3D flight exploration game. You control a little bird on its journey to find a long-forgotten hero. Discover unknown, giant, and beautiful environments and enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a world filled with beauty and little secrets.

name: WolfQuest: Anniversary Edition - Lost River
description: A fictional area in the Mountain West, featuring both expansive wilderness and a mysteriously-abandoned town.

name: Ghost Reaper
description: A fast-paced shooter inspired by combining "Doom Eternal" weapons switching combat with "Titanfall" movement mechanics. Set in a sci-fi fantasy post-apocalyptic world.

name: Markus Ritter: Ghosts of the Past
description: In front of you lies a classic FMV point and click adventure game. Can you stop a serial killer who is murdering his way through Vienna? Experience a week in the life of Markus Ritter, who really just wants to lie on the couch at home, but suddenly has to juggle a job, love and the supernatural.

name: Ghost Killers: The Revenge of the Sucker-Fun
description: You will not just play... You'll live It...Inspired by the series and the movie mixing Horror and Comedy, Blood and Jockes, with different scenarios and environments.Try to survive the hunt of a spirit that wants to possess you anyway

name: The Awakening Program
description: A man hibernates due to an incurable disease, only to awaken as soon as a cure is found, but to preserve his brain during awakening, he lives in a simulation

name: Sexy Valentine
description: Sexy Valentine is a short adult Visual Novel focusing on the romantic parts of life. The protagonist was left without plans and friends for Valentine's Day, and decided to use a dating app. After choosing several similarly lonely guys, he makes a date with them.

name: Birger's Tale
description: Take on the role of a fierce Viking warrior on a quest to defeat enemies, conquer new lands, and earn glory in battle. Master the art of side-scrolling combat as you hack and slash your way through hordes of enemies using a variety of weapons and special abilities.

name: Alien on the Radar
description: Multiplayer game of hiding and seeking. Become an alien and use stealth to deceive others, or a marine and survive long enough to escape.

name: Olympian Wars
description: Olympian Wars is a collectable card game based on greek mythology , collect over 100 unique cards splitted between 7 classes , duel other players on epic battles

name: Marshal in Hell
description: Fight Your Way Out of Hell and Escape Death Itself in this epic Single Player Campaign and turn the tides of war in your favor and save your battalion.

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 14
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 20 art pieces to choose from, and 2000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Talevania
description: Talevania is an action-packed Metroidvania platform game with ever-changing Cards and intense action. The game won't let you relax 'cause you'll never know what to expect ahead.

name: Spring Puzzle
description: In books you can find glowing beauty. Use your knowledge to gain the favor of beautiful women!

name: SlimeCatcher
description: Immerse yourself in a world of pixel art. Your mission is simple to bring home 50 different types of slimes for dinner.
