Some slimes will try to kill you while others are hidden throughout the world. A top down RPG, treasure hunt game A keen eye will be useful to those who play this game.

name: The Secret Door
description: The Secret Door is a first person psychological horror game. Possessed by demons you once hunted, survive 7 nights in a mind-bending labyrinth. Solve puzzles, evade relentless entities, and unlock The Secret Door to escape. Will you emerge sane?

name: My Time
description: Better tomato clock! More free room layout!

name: Soul Taker
description: Win your way out of Hell by Playing the CardGame SoulTaker. A Fun Card Game With a Strong Relaxing Atmosphere and Anime Like Visuals, combined with a Cute Card Dealer From Hell.

name: Poly Puzzle: Animals
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with animals.

name: Hellbreach: Vegas
description:
Hellbreach: Vegas is a Wave-based First-Person Shooter for 1-4 players, made with passion by a one man dev team!

Set your loadout, kill, and earn cash. Take a spin on the various slot machines and level up to improve your survival chances.

Are you ready to try your luck?

name: Plains of Pain
description: Survival multiplayer post-apocalyptic game. Feel the final end of the world, where hope has died. Explore the autonomous post-apocalyptic multiplayer open world and try to survive in these Plains of Pain.

name: Ex Angelus
description: Tear through the world in Ex Angelus, an thrilling action adventure that travels through a world of fantasy and sci fi. Explore futuristic cities and fantasy forest, all while defeating your enemies with stylish, deep combat all while enjoying the beautiful colors and 2D pixel art.

name: Sinner's Tavern
description: Sinner's Tavern is a roguelite platformer with procedural map generation focused on combat and interactions with quirky characters. Inspired by the Dante’s Inferno, help Oscar and his grandpa escape while they announce that Satan's tavern... is now open!

name: The Voices Games Extra Collection
description: A collection of 4 short games from The Voices Games: a 3rd person horror shooter, 2d platformer, flight simulator in a tunnel and a second person escape

name: Full Court Heroes
description: 5-on-5 basketball that is a cross between arcade and simulation reminding you of 8 and 16-bit era games you loved but with modern features. Leave your all on the floor and lead your team to a title. Fast-paced game play, detailed stats, franchise mode, fully-customizable rosters, and much more!

name: Dyer Expedition
description: Dyer Expedition is a puzzle adventure game with light Lovecraftian horror elements and a story inspired by Lovecraft's 1931 novella At the Mountains of Madness.

name: City of Scary Zombies
description: City of Scary Zombies is 3D survival shooter about one of the surviving residents of a city where a terrible zombie apocalypse happened many years ago. You and a group of rebels must maintain life at your base, you will be subordinate to the head of the base.

name: Nith Realms
description: A free-flow action-adventure game with varied realms to travel through. The player will have to defeat powerful bosses and take on dangerous environments in order to obtain the all-powerful elements to take back the Nith.

name: Will-less
description: Will-less is a cyberpunk roguelike action dungeon crawler. As a member of the committee, you will dive into the cyberspace and steal secrets from your targets' minds. Now, control different "Will Agents" with a wide range of weapons and skills to accomplish another thrilling assassination plan!

name: I am Sakuya: Touhou FPS Game - Reimu
description: Continue the adventures from I Am Sakuya with the Reimu expansion pack! Features a whole new character to play as, complete with new weapons, enemies, maps and more!

name: Quantum Gravity: Campaign
description: Quantum Gravity is space themed bullet hell platformer. The game's main mechanic is inverting gravity to hover through space. Including long-range fights but also melees fighting. The Campaign mode features many unique and special levels to complete.

name: Gunforged
description: Gunforged is a fantasy roguelite shooter where you construct powerful and unique builds every run. Forge your dual guns from a huge number of randomized parts and acquire game-changing abilities to create the ultimate monster-slaying hero.

name: Witch Rise
description: An old-school style inspired FPS featuring some action RPG elements, like leveling system, a metroidvania style exploration and 2D sprites in a 3D environment.

name: Steel Revenant
description: Restart and complete the training simulation for CotS-Model 75 in timeless environments against challenging preternatural beings in this melee action adventure.

name: Mysterious Lab
description: A Rouge like game which the player will explore an abandoned Lab. During which, player will fight with zombles and pick up supplyments to strengthen their weapons.

name: First Cut: Samurai Duel
description: Every strike is lethal in this blood-soaked sword fighting game. Slash, clash, parry, dodge and watch limbs fly. Choose your move carefully - the first cut is also the last.

name: December 1914
description: It's a comic-style narrative-oriented game based on the Christmas Eve Truce during World War I.

name: Zeo Effect
description: Zeo effect is a top down shooter with rogue-lite elements, global map and item accumulation where time runs only when you take action. This allows you to adapt to the situation at a comfortable rhythm and destroy enemies with an extensive arsenal of weapons.

name: Legend of Edda Brasil
description: MMORPG para PC grátis em português inspirado em clássicos! Jogue com seus amigos num universo inspirado pela mitologia grega!

name: Russian Train Trip 2
description: Journey on a passenger train in Russia. You play as a first-person character, you have to travel by train for 7 days to Vladivostok. Look out the window, listen to the radio, and move around the carriage.

name: Project-X Zombie vs. Machine Gun
description: Project X is a funny little rpg zombie shooter, but no regular rpg maker game. The usual battle scenes are not used, you have to shoot the zombies with guns. This game is made for you if you like rpg maker games made different than they should. There is no real story, it's just a little fun game.

name: An Everyday Story
description: An Everyday Story is a story-driven puzzle platformer with a heartfelt twist. Experience a life from the view of three trinkets... what do you think happens when our dreams become so real that they stain our reality?

name: KayserRotz
description: 《KyserRotz》 is a new,single,rogue-like,adventure game.Players have to stand their ground under the siege from enemy,challenge to the last.

name: Somewhere in between
description: A beautiful, 3rd-person narrative driven adventure game. Centered around a boy Milo who lost his dog Buddy . Boy was given an responsibility to take care of Buddy, but Buddy got lost. Embark on an adventure and help Milo overcome anxiety and solve the puzzles to reunite with Buddy.

name: Emergent Magic
description: Dash between your foes an unleash spells of your own creation. Build your own magic peice by peice, gather the elements and mark them with runes to do your will. Your weapons are creativity and intellect in this first-personn spell-slinger where YOU are the spell designer.

name: Vetrix Worlds
description: The critically acclaimed Tetris-inspired VR Puzzle game is back with a feature-packed sequel! Enjoy the game alone with our Arcade and Campaign modes, or get social with our all-new Co-op and Competitive Multiplayer Online modes. Time to scratch that OCD itch of yours!

name: Red Glare
description: Red Glare is a real-time-tactics game based on german expeditions(ww2 Setting) across the continent so you will play all type of maps from tropical jungles to snow and desert maps. This game will revive your old school memories of real time tactics games.

name: Hunter Revenge
description: Hunter Revenge is a game that takes place in 2050 where your main objective is to survive as long as possible and collect information for a possible solution to exterminate all mutants.

name: Me, My Mech and I
description: an indie farming sim rogue-like... with mechs!

name: Overstrike Arena
description: Welcome in the overstrike arena, a fast-paced competitive 2 versus 2 simulation where your only goal is to take control of the Overdrive and bring into your opponent's goal. Punch your adversaries, wall-ride, destroy and hack the various evolving arenas to get the advantage.

name: Righteous Mojo
description: Righteous Mojo follows the Rockstar Selene as she loses a Rock Battle with a demon that steals her talent. With the help of the Rock Fairy himself, she travels through the demon's home world to get her talent back.

name: Pyramis
description: Pyramis is a H.R Giger & retro-scifi-inspired survival horror game, that will bring back the genre to its roots and modernize it in the process. The game is driven by its story, beautiful environments, exploration, and horrific themes.

name: idle Party Leader
description: Start your own political party. Steal votes. Become president. Become an autocrat. Suppress a revolution. Tighten grip on power. Conquer the EU. Challenge gods.

name: Zombies Aren't Your Friends
description: A zombie arena-shooter roguelite survivor game. Shoot your way through thousands of zombies to find friends to help you build a better defense. Level up to unlock perks and bonuses to help your team survive longer.

name: Sprint.Fire
description: Sprint.Fire is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter with a focus on advanced movement and marksmanship.

name: Slime Puzzle Story
description: "Slime Puzzle Story" is a puzzle game in which you roll a slime. Move various items in addition to the slime to advance the story of humorous adventures in a mysterious village!

name: Slot Shots Pinball 2
description: Early access for Slot Shots Pinball 2 coming soon! Get ready for a brand new pinball experience from the the creators of the original Slot Shots Pinball Collection!

name: Ninjas in the Dungeon
description: Dungeon attack! In this roguelite shooter game, ninjas fight their way through dungeons and defeat various monsters in order to protect the villagers.

name: Furry Femmes: Making an Obedient Bitch
description: Mike would do anything for Kara, his childhood crush, and her dream of splicing animal DNA into humans. Out of desperation, they accept the help of the mysterious Kevin. When Kara's transformation also starts affecting her mind and making her submissive, Kevin sees his chance to take control...

name: BulletLive
description: BulletLive is a rhythm shooting game in which players shoot targets in VR space in rhythm. Players shoot targets that appear in all directions with blasters held in both hands at the right time.

name: The Outsider TD
description: In this new take on the classic Tower Defense style game you take on the role of Danny who must protect stash houses against waves of rival gangs seeking to destroy them. The towers are you're crew members to place strategically on the map, each of which have a unique weapons & upgrade options.

name: Drift City Underground
description: Drift City Underground is a car drifting game with 8 initial cars that can be unlocked in the Early Access in a open world map with car deep customization and skining. Briliant mechanics will make this game enjoyable and stunning graphics will settle for a AAA Indie game.

name: Not Me!
description: The eight adventurers will explore the mysterious island, but the ship has been damaged by the storm and cannot return. Little did they know that the werewolves on the island had already killed the two adventurers and blended in with the team, playing hide-and-seek with the other humans.

name: Captain Disaster and the Two Worlds of Riskara
description: A new Captain Disaster adventure; this time he is more of a hero than a disaster! ... Or is he? A point and click adventure game with cartoony graphics, epic storyline and more bad jokes than you can possibly imagine. Buy this game. It is your destiny...

name: Magnet Jack
description: Magnet Jack is a 90's parody puzzle-platformer. Jack has an ever-changing variety of wacky mechanics in over 150 stages that will both make you think and challenge your reflexes. Plus a top-down overworld with off-the-wall themes and characters.

name: Cryodeath VR
description: Procedurally generated survival horror.

name: Pomegranate Tea
description: The noble Earl August Schernadier invites Baroness Olivia to a eleveness. Spending a fun time over a cup of tea, the Earl recalls the pomegranate tea brought from Sri Lanka, and we offer to taste it. Olivia takes a sip…

name: Sanctuary: Shattered Sun
description: Sanctuary is a Traditional Real Time Strategy game featuring Strategic Zoom, Streaming Economy, Simulated Projectiles and Grand Scale. Take control of armies of hundreds upon hundreds of units and crush your enemies!

name: Family Business
description: I'm going to make you an offer you can't refuse...Have you ever thought about being part of the Mafia?So enter in the world of Family Business,a massive first-Person shooter. Play against other players, earn cash, buy weapons, improve your arsenal and show everyone whos BOSS !

name: Turret Girl
description: Turret Girl is a romantic visual novel about her struggles to find love and acceptance in a hostile world, with a Match3 Jewels mini-game to break up the action.

name: Death's Dungeon
description: Survive the onslaught of Death's Dungeon in a rogue-like dungeon crawler with RPG elements. Shoot and melee your way through various dungeons with four different classes.

name: Grim Knight
description: explore dungeons, collect powerful relics, defeat monsters. Hoards of unique monsters with speciel abilities are guarding the dungeons from you. Use and combine a ton of diffrent relics and weapons to get stronger and cut through them and their bosses.

name: Kill the Climbers
description: Kill The Climbers is a retro roguelite arcade game where you play as a mountain and yeti with the goal of defending the peak. Use your quick wits, skillshot-slinging abilities, and animal defenders to Kill The Climbers!

name: Vivat Rex
description: An old school turn based strategy game about building and conquering a medieval empire. With real-time tactical combat.

name: It's Dark Inside
description: It's Dark inside is a turn-and-tile-based, Horror Adventure where you play as a Mother setting out to save her child by killing a horrific God from the inside. Carefully plan out your every move in this game, for every action will be met with wrath from the creatures that lurk inside.

name: Ninano: Dream Ranch
description: Welcome to the ranch where you can raise various animals! Go to a competition with lovely animals and become the best rancher. Decorate your own cute and wonderful ranch. In addition, fishing, cooking, gathering, dating, and various mini-games are waiting for you!

name: Danger Cliff
description: It's a 2D Collectathon! Pull of crazy stunts with the directional cone rush and other moves as you blast through huge levels with unique sets of mechanics and visual style!

name: Otherworld Legends: Aigneis
description: Meet Aigneis: A Selenian princess and an adept astromancer. Aigneis inherits both her father's valiance and her mother's magical affinity, trouncing foes who would trifle with her using her shapeshifting scepter, Mondnacht.

name: Pool Ball Battle Royale
description: Control your own pool ball and try to knock your opponents into the holes in this action-packed game. Outmaneuver and defeat your opponents with strategy and quick reflexes to emerge victorious.

name: Grievous Survivors
description: Sin descripción

name: GoPogo
description: Race your friends on Pogo Sticks! Race as Animals through a range of different biomes and landscapes. Customize your character and race in style.

name: Reversed Rebecca
description: The RPG game where your choices really matter! Find tools, solve puzzles, go back in time and reverse causality! But beware of the consequences...

name: Ragnarok Survivors: Valhalla
description: Prove to Odin that you deserve a place at the table in the afterlife and survive Ragnarok.

name: Origins
description: Origins is a playable short created by the team at Inworld AI to showcase NPCs powered by artificial intelligence. After an explosion in Metropolis, you’ve arrived on the scene as the lead detective. Question witnesses, uncover the mystery, and solve the case. From the creator of The Matrix Awakens

name: Elong Plug
description: Play as an elastic plug trying to become as long as LORD ELON. Use your climbing, dangling, and stretching skills to collect coins and buy length upgrades. Will LORD ELON accept you?

name: Maeldor: Enhanced Edition
description: Ready to fight against the ultimate evil? A 2D Action-Adventure Platformer with RPG elements in it! Control one of 3 legendary heroes in this adventure filled with magic, enemies, traps, puzzles, treasures and more! Upgrade your characters skills & abilities as you explore the vast lands of Maeldor!

name: Hotel Simulator
description: Hotel Simulator is your chance to start a new life as a hotel owner! Keep up with you clients demands by renovating, cleaning and upgrading.

name: Sex, Love & Girls
description: Sex, Love & Girls is a short adult Visual Novel focusing on the romantic parts of life The protagonist had a good time the night before, got drunk and liked a bunch of girls on a dating app. After receiving date offers, he makes a date with them and goes in search of true love.

name: Master of Puppets
description: Turn based strategy game with resource management and a deck building mechanic

name: The Slush Force
description: Aliens are invading, and you, a recently demoted small-town police chief, are caught in the middle of it all. Beat back the extraterrestrial interlopers in this action-packed blend of real-time tactics and turn-based strategy!

name: Get to the Gate
description: GetToTheGate is a roguelike about a girl that needs to reach the Gate to the world of the living while being extremely scared of monsters. When her fear builds up, she loses her mana and runs to safety. Find a shortcut to bypass the enemies and explore the dungeon from a new location.

name: Ink Bunny
description: Relaxing puzzle game with ink bunnies.

name: Earth Rising
description: Earth Rising - A game about building CubeSat and learning more about this small satellite and how it functions. You are in the role of a robot that has a mission to put into space as many CubeSat satellites as you can so you can find different resources for future space flight development.

name: Lillysia
description: Find herbs to cure your pet from illness.

name: League Manager 2023
description: Complete your own squad, try to win the league, and experience a thrilling win in the World Championship. The journey to E-Sport League glory awaits.

name: Bulletproof
description: Do you think you can be bulletproof? Try the innovative shooting simulator.

name: Gluua
description: first-person 1-4 multiplayer horror game. The game will allow players to take on the role of a spirit liberator who will be able to freely choose missions based on the difficulty and readiness they like or want to do. Players will encounter the supernatural and find the truth in that place.

name: What Lies Under
description: What Lies Under is a fishing game taking place in calm and relaxing waters full of fishes, treasures and more.

name: Chess & Guns
description: Chess & Guns is a mix between chess and real-time third person combat. Use your piece's weapon, ability and the environment to your advantage to be the last one on the board.

name: Just Xiangqi
description: This is a refreshing Chinese chess game with realistic graphics and a detailed audio tutorial that will keep you entertained, even as a novice. A variety of well-designed challenges will test your tactics. Sit back and relax, as you transform into a master of strategy.

name: Without You
description: "Without You" is a non-linear visual novel about the life of a Moscowia State University student, having one dream - freedom. There is no room for lies: all the beauty and ugliness of Russia will appear before your eyes in its original form. What to think of it afterwards is up to you.

name: Prehistoric Warcraft
description: This is a duel independent game! There are eight characters in it, you can play with your friends! It has a unique way of playing. I hope you can experience infinite fun from it! It's definitely worth it!

name: PumpKin Majo
description: Our pumpkin witch tries to avoid hitting the evil pumpkins and stay away from other enemies while collecting green orbs and trying to reach the highest score on halloween. So it takes a lot of effort to make the highest score on halloween.

name: Goblin Colony
description: Goblin Colony is a real-time strategy game with building and settlement management features. As the keeper of the dungeon you will command an ambitious tribe of goblins as you explore, build and do battle with your foes across a huge campaign.

name: Elephantasy: Flipside
description: Use and upgrade magic items, collect hidden treasures, and uncover the secrets between two worlds in this cute isometric puzzler! When a certain vacationing Elephant stumbles upon a way into the land of the dead, will she unwittingly let something far more sinister slip through?

name: Futa Heroism
description: Enter the lighthearted fictional world of Lady Fantastica in this second ever side story of Heroes of Eroticism. Help up-and-coming hero Lady Futanarica face challenges such as fighting villains, dealing with the Super Duper Awesome Company and having a pregnant girlfriend.

name: Dead of the Sea
description: Dead of the sea is a pirate-themed VR multiplayer survival shooter where you can join your fellow pirates to end the curse of the Island of Lost Souls. Survive waves of the island's deadly inhabitants while collecting magical power by defeating enemies.

name: Wormhole Cafe
description: A fantastic sex simulator is here! Wormhole Cafe is a passionate addition bringing an ignored genre to Steam. Engage with 4 unique characters in different situations using wormholes. No matter where they are or what they're doing, they're ready to satisfy you!

name: The Summon
description: This is an RPG where you can decide what kind of build you are going to make. Become a tank that focuses on damage mitigation, healing and reflecting damage back to your opponents or a glass cannon that focuses on high burst damage with massive lifesteal.

name: There Can Only be Two
description: Venture down to a cute and colorful adventure game where you kill baddies, meet & help new friends, explore new areas, and fulfill your destiny as a kingdom guard!

name: Torecower
description: Torecower is an arcade wave-based minimalist game where you build automatic turrets to shoot enemies. Each turret has an unique attack behaviour. After finishing a wave, you can get an upgrade on the skill tree. Choose wisely to make your turrets stronger.

name: Hide Time
description: Hide Time is a puzzle based game with horror elements, telling a story about the closed for good toys store. Explore the abandoned toy store and try to find a safe place and collect supplies to stay alive! The toys will try to kill you! Will you survive in this scary world controlled by living toys?

name: Sinoven
description: A father goes into an abandoned hospital to find his daughter. There is a ghost haunting the hospital, that causes strange events to occur. Father and Daughter are both alive, it is a dual protagonist game split into 2 acts.

name: Angira Online
description: Angira Online is a survival and building game set in a fantasy Norse world. Set out into an unknown world and make your mark on the unexplored wilderness. Build towns, lay roads, bring civilization to the forests of Angira.

name: Operation Siege
description: Operation Siege is an online multiplayer tactical FPS based on air combat, ground combat, with a selection of realistic faction-specific weapons and vehicles allow players to build their own loadouts for their preferred tactics. Prepare yourself for that operation.

name: 1941: Operation Barbarossa
description: PC conversion of a turn-based hex-strategy board war game.

name: Spilled!
description: Clean up ocean waste in this relaxing & satisfying cozy game! Recycle, earn coins, upgrade your boat, repeat! Explore and clean up new areas with more waste and new challenges!

name: Halves
description: Set out on your way to warn the king in a world divided in two halves. Your decisions will completely change your path.

name: Way In The Stars: The Threat
description: This is a science fiction adventure with stealth and survival elements. You must go on a journey on different planets to save yourself and find the answers, explore the wild unconquered world, survive on a dead planet, and stop the unknown threat.

name: Sigil of Kings
description: Sigil of Kings is a turn-based fantasy roguelike/RPG, set in an expansive procedurally generated world, displayed in colorful 16-bit pixel art. Explore dungeons, defeat enemies, solve puzzles, find treasures, visit cities, join guilds and make your mark in a living, breathing world.

name: Your Otherworldly Harem
description: The use of religious explanation, to explain the origin of ghosts in anime. The soul is immortal, the monster in the anime, is a well-designed body, can accurately trap the soul, the reason why the monster is hard and fast, is because the body good use of the energy of the trapped soul.

name: Pact of Steel
description: A WW2 Tower Defense game, with minor aspects of an RTS game.

name: Lewd Anime Racing
description: Play as a cute & excited contender in this racing challenge. Rise up the ranks and unlock lewd & NSFW collectible cards of former racers and world heroes.

name: The Thief, the Witch, the Toad, and the Mushroom.
description: A fable from your childhood. Don't you remember it?

name: Christmas Stories: Taxi of Miracles - Collector's Edition
description: A tough year has put a damper on your town’s holiday cheer. With Christmas just around the corner, it’s up to you and a jolly cab driver named Nick to help townspeople in need and share the true meaning of Christmas with one and all!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Cities 2
description: Puzzles of Cities!

name: Captain Blacksword
description: Become the infamous pirate Captain Blacksword and stab your way through three beautiful 8-bit islands in search of the pieces to a magical compass!

name: VR Dinosaur Invasion
description: This is a VR shooting game that requires a plane to attack the dinosaurs that want to destroy your home and defend your paradise.

name: Better Save Souls
description: Choose your character and go on an unforgettable adventure, start as a mere mortal and become a powerful demigod, master fearsome magic combinations and find your play style.

name: Grapples Galore
description: Grapples Galore is a fast-paced online multiplayer arena shooter with physics-based grappling hook movement, active ragdolls, and thrilling gunplay.

name: The Lord of the Parties x Kokonoe Yukari
description: The peace-loving anime shrine maiden Vtuber “Kokonoe Yukari” has joined The Lord of the Parties!

name: Roman Empire vs. Barbarians
description: Barbarians keep expanding all over the place and you’ve been summoned as the hero who’s going to stop them. You’re provided with a Roman Empire tower that comes with a powerful catapult and a team of warriors. Will that be enough to stop the barbarian invasion?

name: Oedo Trigger!!
description: A FPS game where you fight against a large number of kimono girls who are attacking you! In addition to fighting from the FPS perspective, you can also fight on a tank, in a helicopter, or in a There are also stages where you fight from a TPS perspective!

name: Soul Stalker
description: The survivor roguelike where you slay your psyche. Take down waves of enemies in the natural evolution of the genre established by Vampire Survivors, with visuals inspired by Paper Mario.

name: Mothership Forever
description: Fight against an ever-evolving threat in this skill-based twinstick shooter 14 years in the making.

name: Genba no Kizuna
description: A mesozoic murder mystery, 4 suspects, 1 truth. Investigate, interrogate and present evidence as you set out to unravel the case with your team. Will you be able to accurately determine who took the victim's life? Or will your deductions lead you to arrest someone for a crime they did not commit...?

name: Something's Out There
description: Something's Out There is a micro-horror creature hunting game, featuring multiple unique creatures across multiple maps. Hunters work together using the tools provided at base or found around the map to track down, hunt, and ultimately kill the creature of which only stories claim exist.

name: Endless Samurai
description: "Endless Samurai" is a roguelite that overcomes death and becomes stronger. You can experience a new battle system aiming at "fusion of turn-based and speedy action".

name: Never Immortal
description: Never Immortal is a 2D multiplayer topdown shooter with two different exciting gamemodes. Battle with up to 20 players against either hordes of zombies in the Wave Survival gamemode, or against eachother in the Who is the Zombie gamemode.

name: Other World Survivors
description: Other World Survivors is inspired by survivor games and classical games.Pick a hero and survive in the endless coming monster tide, build every skill of yours, and finally beat the Dominators.Game features:1.Personalized upgrade;2.Chemical recations, chain recations.3.Roguelike not Roguelite.

name: Love x Time
description: "Love x Time" is a unique hentai novel with lots of hot girls! Here you can feel like a hero of different events and eras! You will get incredible pleasure from the game and its gameplay!

name: Snowy Mountain
description: Snowy Mountain offers an exciting gameplay experience with procedurally generated physics terrain, 100+ challenges and a wide variety of skins and gear to unlock. Upgrade your skills to reach new speeds and heights in the 3D low-poly world, with every play experience being unique

name: Bargain Blocz
description: In bargain blocz you have to fill up the boards without loosing much time.

name: Abyss World
description: Abyss World is a third-person ARPG game. Players will explore the "Old Tide" in the vast Nornidia land, explore its secrets, challenge the threats in the underworld, experience different stories, and write their own epic tale of adventure.

name: Eaten by Darkness
description: Fast paced mayhem in a hellish nightmare. Feel the dread of fear lingering nearby and the exhilaration of being chased by demons and undead in this bloody violent horror first person shooter. A highly detailed Unreal Engine 5 game utilizing advanced Nanite and Niagara graphics.

name: Snow Moon Flower
description: This is a martial arts novel style RPG.

name: Containment Zone
description: Containment Zone is a hardcore, realistic, tactical shooter in which the player fights his way through escaped mutant experiments, zombies, and military private contractors to uncover the secrets of the Object 1611 laboratory hidden deep within the Soldanesti district Containment Zone.

name: Dawn One
description: Fight to survive till Dawn One in the most accessible hardest top-down action game ever (Self proclaimed). Mouse only.

name: Mental Harm
description: Mental Harm is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore an old, long forgotten atmospheric basement of a house where some strange things are happening

name: 100% Hits
description: 100% Hits is a mini tank tactical shooting game. It fights with powerful AI enemies. Time and ammo box are variables you need to consider. You can sneak attack the enemy behind the bunker or disturb the enemy by moving quickly. Anyway, you should always keep your head cool!

name: Caverns
description: Explore the randomized cave systems, find a wide selection of items, collect rare ores and master the quick platformer gameplay of "Caverns"! The endless mines offer deadly dangers arround every corner!

name: Lorne
description: In a wartorn world you are key to restore peace and order to the lands of Lorne. Equip Evelyn with the right tools you can find, craft or upgrade in this ARPG featuring interactive combat, open world exploration and intimidating temples filled with puzzles. End the corruption and keep Lorne safe.

name: Go Over the Edge
description: Brandie Hunter, a day laborer, works in the sewers, but always dreams of succeeding high up in the sky. Players have to clear the difficult game without Save System, even in the game, to sympathize with the hard life of this worker.

name: Fragmented City
description: Immersive first person adventure game heavily focusing on meaningful exploration and social quests. Fragmented City is full of quirky characters, twisting stories and intriguing urban places.

name: Out Here Alone
description: A minimalist sci-fi/horror roguelite, featuring space combat, exploration, and local co-op multiplayer.

name: The Year of the Carrot
description: A cool game where you pick up carrots, throw stuff around and watch it bounce off the walls.

name: Synth Pong
description: Synth Pong is a twist on the classic Pong game and is perfect for anyone who loves the 80's synthwave aesthetic. You can challenge your friends in intense PvP sessions or enjoy the game solo in story mode, as well as a series of levels and challenges.

name: First Sexy Night 2: Second Date
description: You just lost your virginity to Ginny and the whole world of sexual possibilities is wide open. Short and intimate visual novel about one relationship and their journey of sexual exploration.

name: Offsea
description: Explore an archipelago in a dark open-world ocean with a boat and a gun to uncover the terrible truth while being chased by something in the sea.

name: Stale Nation
description: You find yourself playing as Thomas, a young man who recently reaches the end of the trail after a long hiking trip. He comes home to a world plunged into chaos from an outbreak of infection that turns people into rabid beasts. Will you help Thomas find a way out of this madness?

name: Foxventures
description: Welcome to the classic 2D platform game where you play as a brave fox. Help the fox go through various obstacles, destroy all the monsters and reach the end of the lands.

name: Core Devourer
description: Hunt down huge hordes of droids, absorb their cores and become the strongest cybernetic being. In this sci-fi action-packed roguelite, you unlock weapons with unique effects, craft powerful gear and create endless combinations of upgrades for your character. Make your choice and break the game.

name: Hoppin
description: Hoppin is an exciting 3D action platformer in which a little dragon tries to get to the top. Along the way, various creatures will get in your way. Play alone or online with your friends to find out what happened to the other dragons.

name: Vranygrai
description: Story driven action-adventure game about Slavic priest, the Volkhv, looking for redemption. As two principalities clash behind the scenes in historically inspired events that formed Great Moravia, you will go on personal quest and step into the world of pagan beliefs, mythology and fairy tales.

name: Crossout: Savior
Metal Detecting Simulator
description: 2D platformer with a view from the top. In the game you have to buy equipment to search for various items. Metal detectors, shovels, will help you in this. You come to the new land, you need to buy land and start searching for gold and coins, as well you will come across junk.

name: Osawari Hockey Enko-chan
description: Hit the ball and make the girl feel goodIt's a game where you play a ball like air hockey and hit a girl to enjoy her reaction.Hit the part where the girl feels and fill the sensitivity gauge to move to the next scene.

name: Surrealidade: Definitive Edition
description: Surrealidade: Definitive Edition is an expanded version of the surreal cult adventure in a journey into the world of the unconscious through Surrealist Techniques, which now includes new extra content, various improvements, and an English translation of the game.

name: Sinners Landing
description: Sinners Landing is an adult-themed, romance-based, dungeon crawling RPG with a card-style battle mechanic. Explore dungeons, slay monsters, get loot, and romance the women of the local town.

name: As Above AtumRa So Below
description: A challenging, first/third person adventure and puzzle game set across multiple plains of existence. You play many characters, mixing their souls to overcome complex challenges and solve deep mysteries to save reality. Built in unreal engine, enjoy a graphically impressive game with a deep story

name: Moon Lab Shooter
description: This game was inspired by alien shooter games, but this game intended for players to have fun with the game itself. don't focus on difficulty

name: Grey Instinct: Part 2
description: Grey Instinct: Part 2 continues off with Grey and Kana being attacked by a mysterious intruder! They chase after him and stumble into an even bigger mystery! What's going on? Where is Uncle David? And more importantly, will Grey get any better at dating?!?

name: Sanctus
description: The main character, Anna, is a young woman who decides to enter a monastery. The young nun soon realizes that the convent holds many dark secrets.

name: Heroic City
description: A Party MMO with real-world impact. Hang out with your friends, decorate your apartment and play dozens of action-packed multiplayer games. Team up with a sponsor and unlock impact items to be hatched into real world impact such as trees and carbon removed from the atmosphere.

name: Tenebris: Terra Incognita
description: A turn-based tactical RPG in which you will explore a harsh planet teeming with terrifying monsters. Experiment with talent builds for 23 heroes. Combine abilities with equipment and other characters. Assemble a squad and learn the secrets of the planet Tenebris!

name: IwoCon 2
description: IwoCon is a virtual gaming conference. Why do conventions need to be conventional? Explore gaming booths & more all done in a TPS game! Fly across the galaxy, visit space stations & drive between extraterrestrial cities & bases, all while controlling customizable avatars!

name: CircusTroupe
description: This is my personal game.

name: Another Bar Game
description: A casual action game where you serve craft beer to thirsty bar guests. Become the most popular bartender in town! Wash glasses, clean tables and keep everybody happy! From the creator of Dude, Where Is My Beer?

name: Survive the Fog
description: Survive the Fog is a fast-paced action rogue-lite with rich variety of powers and spells, hidden upgrades and combinations of abilities. Unlock characters with different movesets and maps with different challenges and monsters.

name: Puzzling Wild IQ Test
description: Puzzling Wild introduces this IQ Test of logic and visual reasoning. These IQ Tests were developed by a Professor to try to test the intelligence of AI robots. Can you solve all 400 by your self? The puzzles are introduced by our good friends Ginger the Giraffe, and Hugo Hippo.

name: Ankewill
description: Enjoy Derdo's rich story, mixed turn-based strategy and loads of mini-games, all done over and over for your enjoyment.

name: Demon Hentai Slayer
description: Demon Hentai Slayer is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process. To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music.

name: Museum of Monoliths
description: A slow burn walking sim with interactive soundtrack and horror vibes. You explore abstract locations and create your own unique sound for each of them by moving around and using Monoliths.

name: Gachi: Space Orgasm
description: Gachi: Space Orgasm is a third-person shooter with lots of weapons to choose from, hot scenes to unlock, weapon upgrades, and unique levels and boss battles. The dynamic controller adds an extra layer of excitement to the gameplay.

name: Fishbowl Kid
description: Fishbowl Kid is an uplifting interactive story about coping with depression.

name: Kanashibari
description: Kanashibari is a unique game with rouge-lite elements and real-time grid-based combat.

name: Attack Zone
description: Attack Zone is an FPS Shooter. You are placed in an attack zone and must fight for your survival.

name: Cafe Simulator
description: Build and decorate your shop, diversify your products through alliances, and make the right investments to expand your business.

name: Soul Bound Saga
description: A single player sci-fi/fantasy based role playing game with optional multiplayer aspects. Traverse the world, unlock the true power within your Soul.

name: Wizabeasts
description: Wizabeasts is a monster-taming RPG with tactical battles! Uncover a mystery from the past, take down a dangerous gang, and get your student debt forgiven by defeating club champions!

name: Eden Gamma
description: In the world of Eden Gamma, find clues and let your gun do the talking in this side scrolling cybperpunk action-platformer!

name: Julia: A Science Journey
description: Julia: A Science Journey is a narrative adventure about viruses, society, and life choices.

name: Mushroom Agent
description: You spawn in a new world and your mission is to hunt all the mushrooms and become a champion mushroom hunter.

name: Colorway Antics
description: Embark on an exhilarating VR adventure with Colorway Antics! Unleash your creativity across unique environments! Fly freely, paint with brushes or splatter with paintballs. Endless colors await as you transform unique 3D spaces into your own multi-dimensional masterpieces.

name: Cave Raider
description: Cave Raider - A top-down game where the player controls the character, dodging the walking dead, collecting the wandering souls of girls and playing otherworldly games to get further.
